SectorVocabulary.name: OECD DAC CRS Purpose Codes (5 digit)
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to an OECD DAC CRS 5-digit purpose code

SectorVocabulary.name: OECD DAC CRS Purpose Codes (3 digit)
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to an OECD DAC CRS 3-digit purpose code

SectorVocabulary.name: Classification of the Functions of Government (UN)
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to the UN Classification of the Functions of Government (CoFoG)

SectorVocabulary.name: Statistical classification of economic activities in the European Community
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to the statistical classifications of economic activities in the European Community

SectorVocabulary.name: National Taxonomy for Exempt Entities (USA)
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to the National Taxonomy for Exempt Entities (NTEE) - USA

SectorVocabulary.name: AidData
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to AidData classifications

SectorVocabulary.name: SDG Goal
SectorVocabulary.description: A value from the top-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1’)

SectorVocabulary.name: SDG Target
SectorVocabulary.description: A value from the second-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1.1’)

SectorVocabulary.name: SDG Indicator
SectorVocabulary.description: A value from the second-level list of UN sustainable development (SDG) indicators

SectorVocabulary.name: Humanitarian Global Clusters (Inter-Agency Standing Committee)
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to an Inter-Agency Standard Committee Humanitarian Global Cluster code

SectorVocabulary.name: North American Industry Classification System (NAICS)
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to the NAICS codelist

SectorVocabulary.name: UN System Function
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to the UN System Function codelist

SectorVocabulary.name: Reporting Organisation
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to a sector vocabulary maintained by the reporting organisation for this activity

SectorVocabulary.name: Reporting Organisation 2
SectorVocabulary.description: The sector reported corresponds to a sector vocabulary maintained by the reporting organisation for this activity (if they are referencing more than one)
